title: Grilled Italian Stuffed French Bread
directions: Preheat grill to medium heat.Slice bread into 12 pieces.
Mix together cream cheese and pesto. Spread over both sides of slices then sprinkle slices with cheese.
Spray a 15‚Äù piece of heavy foil with cooking oil. Reassemble loaf then wrap tightly in foil.
Grill 12-15 minutes or until heated through. Turning half way through cooking time.
ingredients: 1 loafFrench Baguette Bread (667), thawed and sliced into 12 pieces
